McKinney-Vento Internet Resources Submitted by Anonymous (not verified) on Fri, 09/30/2011 - 9:53am Posted: Fri, 09/30/2011 - 9:53am Updated: Thu, 07/09/2015 - 1:10pm National Center for Homeless Education at SERVE The NCHE web site provides numerous resources on homelessness and education for children and youth. Included are McKinney-Vento Legislation, a monthly feature of a model program, and a variety of other information and resources on homeless children and youth. National Association for the Education of Homeless Children and Youth The NAEHCY web site is an excellent source for research, publications, legislative updates, and events that promote the enrollment, attendance, and academic success of homeless children and youth.
